control_attributes.control_description: The information system enforces [Assignment: organization-defined one-way information flows] using hardware mechanisms.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system separates information flows logically or physically using [Assignment: organization-defined mechanisms and/or techniques] to accomplish [Assignment: organization-defined required separations by types of information].

Control Statement: The information system enforces [Assignment: organization-defined one-way information flows] using hardware mechanisms.
